title: Driveclub Font please
content:
Same or similar font please, thanks for the help ;)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Driveclub_4808.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Driveclub.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429/http:/typophile.com/files/Driveclub_0.jpg) | 34.34 KB |
author: The-Marker

comments.content:
Close, but not bold enough:  
Route 66 NF  
 [http://www.identifont.com/show?JJ7](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429/http:/www.identifont.com/show?JJ7 "http://www.identifont.com/show?JJ7")  
Close, but not wide enough:  
Refrigerator  
 [http://www.linotype.com/717036/RefrigeratorDeluxeStdHeavy-product.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429/http:/www.linotype.com/717036/RefrigeratorDeluxeStdHeavy-product.html "http://www.linotype.com/717036/RefrigeratorDeluxeStdHeavy-product.html")  
Recent discussion of similar font:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/106047](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429/http:/typophile.com/node/106047 "http://typophile.com/node/106047")  
Don
**[Stratum 2 Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312040429/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process_type_foundry/stratum_2_black_ot/ot_ps)** is also very close - if not an exact match
